name: Get Out (itch) (TCDelfino)
description:
Get Out tells the story of a photographer, who gets kidnapped by killer clowns. He wakes up in a dark room, beside a table. Now he has to find a way to get out of that place.

For this, he has to go through 6 levels, divided in rooms and connected by doors.

In each level, the player is submitted to a puzzle, which must be solved in order to reach the next room.

Contact: tobiasc.d1@gmail.com

Twitter: @DelfinoTobias | Facebook: Tobias Costa Delfino
